Blog.post: Dear journal, there is one person name ryann who did not want to belanja me!!hahaha..kakak told me her name is mai..she seems like a nice person to me and sis..i think kakak and her are bestfriends..i also think kakak like 'him'..hahahax..maybe not or yes..i saw her picture..she look very cool and even cute..i think she look better than other bungs i see on kakak's friendster..i also don't know how kakak know her..hahahax..ryann haven't bathe yet when kakak call her..Eeeeee!!!hahahahax..kakak seems happy with her..but when kakak is alone she seems quiet..MAYBE ryann makes her happy but i hope she don't leave kakak like her friends did..like CHARMAINE..charmaine didn't call kakak like she usually do..usually she will call kakak and tell kakak her problems..now when she got no PROBLEMS..she LEAVE kakak alone..maybe because she is already happy with jessie..haix..kakak friends are FAKE!!!I THINK KAKAK LOVE RYANN!hahahahax..

Dear journal, today I went to cemetery to visit my grandfather..He was a lovely grandfather who takes cares of his own grandchildren..I was so sad when he past away on 5 may 2000..I could not take it anymore..We usually visit him when we were free..After we visit,we went to jurong point to eat at banquet..It was a nice places..I eat a bowl of yong Tao foo laksa..After eating we went around the shopping mall..They sold many different cosmetics and lot of other kinds..We went home at about 1.45pm because my sister,saerah,came back home without the keys..then we have to came back home rushing..hiya!!!
test test is it working? haha

dear journal, haiyo! anyway today i got scolded from teacher..(mdm shireen who else..)she is so strict ..many people scare of her..i mean what teacher is not strict..tuesday is going to be the last day of my art..sheesh! should have done it last week..anyway,today i eat rice plain wit chilli..so hot you know..anyway,i start liking chilli not bad ..ok ..may i ask a question( important ) why do lesbian exist in singapore most likely in earth ?
